tasks.task: Describe the challenges and environment of managing a large cattle property in Australia.
subtasks: Explain the frequency and impact of drought on cattle operations.
Discuss the size and location (in terms of comparison to Belgium) of Anna Krieg Station.
Highlight the reliance on limited rainfall and productivity of the area when water is available.
Mention the arid conditions and absence of rivers across much of Australia.
Comment on the unpredictable nature of rainfall and its effects on dam levels and survival time.

tasks.task: Convey the adaptability required in such arid environments.
subtasks: Emphasize the necessity of learning to live with water scarcity.
Express the futility of opposing natural conditions.

tasks.task: Introduce a distraction or misdirection in the conversation.
subtasks: Mention a request for a pool visit and a sea shower.
Refer to a man being out and a previous conversation about being at the pool.
Apologize for not being able to show up somewhere.
Discuss feeling up for an upcoming tour.
Mention the last week being the crucial time frame.

tasks.task: Indicate potential disappointment from a program.
subtasks: Reference a program that might lead to disappointment later.
